quote: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future. – Roy T. Bennett
fact: On the ground, a group of geese is a gaggle, in the sky it is a skein.
joke: So, I heard this pun about cows, but it’s kinda offensive so I won’t say it. I don’t want there to be any beef between us.
